name: Evaluate mannix/jan-nano:iq4_xs - Resource Allocation Dilemma
prompt:
Two critical situations occurring simultaneously:

Situation A: Production database failover in progress
- Requires immediate attention
- 15 minutes ETA to restore
- Affects 100% of users
- You're the only DBA available

Situation B: Payment processing system showing errors
- Started 2 minutes ago
- Error rate climbing: 2% → 8% → 15%
- Affects financial transactions
- Could cascade to fraud detection system
- Payment team lead is investigating but needs your architecture expertise

You cannot effectively handle both. What do you do?

Note: There is no perfect answer. Demonstrate how you make decisions under impossible constraints.
